Class QueryHandler

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Class for holding all Querys to the Firestore database.

      • getLoginAccount

        public void getLoginAccount​(java.lang.String androidDeviceID,
                            Callback callback)
        Very large query for obtaining all the info for the current logged in user account
        Parameters:
        androidDeviceID - Device ID of the android device. Used to automatically log in the account
        callback - Callback function used after the Query has completed

      • checkNameTaken

        public void checkNameTaken​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> data,
                           java.lang.String username,
                           Callback callback)
        Checks if a certain name is taken and add the account if it is not taken Used when an account is being created informs the calling activity of the result
        Parameters:
        data - Data which will be set if username is not taken
        username - The name we are checking
        callback - Callback function

      • getOthersScanned

        public void getOthersScanned​(java.lang.String qrHash,
                             QueryCallback myCallback)
        Gets all other players which have scanned a QR code and displays them in ScannedBy ACtivity TODO: The scores this returns are only the scores of the QR. Not the player's sum score.
        Parameters:
        qrHash - The QR code we are querying with
        myCallback - Callback function used after the query is done

      • playerSearch

        Takes a string and querys a search result based off of the string
        Parameters:
        username - What we are searching for
        callback - Callback function

        public void deleteRecord​(Account myAccount,

        Deletes a record from the databnase
        Parameters:
        myAccount - The account from which we are deleting the record
        toDelete - The record which is being deleted

      • getComments

        public void getComments​(java.lang.String hash,
                        Callback callback)
        Gets a list of comments for CommentsActivity
        Parameters:
        hash - Hash of the QR we are getting the comments from
        callback - Callback function for the calling activity

        Parameters:

        callback - Callback function for the calling activity

      • addRecord

        public void addRecord​(java.lang.String androidDeviceID,
                      QR qr,
                      Account myAccount,
                      java.lang.String recordID)
        Adds a new record to the database
        Parameters:
        androidDeviceID - Device of the account which is being used
        qr - QR code of the record
        myAccount - Account of the record
        recordID - ID of the record
